snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes creative job titles, using the Web to predict crime and iPhone vs. Android.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes creative job titles, using the Web to predict crime and iPhone vs. Android.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: All Those Chiefs and Crime Prediction
